summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3602 , for the improvement of 22nd Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 54th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by construction of watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 44435 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
